org.intermine.web.struts

Class ModifyDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • DispatchAction
      • org.intermine.web.struts.ModifyDetails

  • public class ModifyDetails
extends DispatchAction
    Action to handle events related to displaying Report templates and displayers
